text: Ube crinkles, also known as purple yam crinkles, are Filipino cookies made from purple yam, flour, eggs, baking powder, butter, and sugar. They are characteristically deep purple in color and are typically rolled in powdered sugar or glazed. They have a crunchy exterior and a soft chewy center. ==See also== *Ube cake *Paciencia (cookie) *Pandesal *Pan de monja (Monáy) * List of cookies == References == Category:Cookies Category:Philippine desserts Category:Ube dishes
title: Ube crinkles
